statements.statement: DELETE /*+ 박재훈::/gcb/batch/itOpSpt/cmnTblOpMg/dm05SrtmWdstDatHisPhsDatDelJob/Dm05SrtmWdstDatHisPhsDatDel/delSrtmWdstDatHis */ FROM INSTC.TBGCBDM05 /* GCB준실시간배포데이터내역 */ WHERE 작업기준년월일 <= ${작업기준년월일} AND ROWNUM <= 100

SELECT /*+ 박재훈::/gcb/batch/itOpSpt/cmnTblOpMg/dm05SrtmWdstDatHisPhsDatDelJob/Dm05SrtmWdstDatHisPhsDatDel/retvSrtmWdstDatHisNcn */ COUNT(1) 건수_N10 FROM INSTC.TBGCBDM05 A /* GCB준실시간배포데이터내역 */ WHERE A.작업기준년월일 <= ${작업기준년월일}
